enable-robot-spider.name: Blending Glow on Robots & Spiders
enable-robot-spider.description: Enables blending glow on robots and spiders, which didn't have blending glow in 2.1.

brighter-glow.name: Increase Glow Brightness
brighter-glow.description: Increases glow brightness by 50% to emulate the pre-2.2 glow color.
